source_id: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_034_chunk7
evidence_span: Iodine SIMFEX tests on unlined unirradiated and irradiated Zircaloy-4 showed that the PCI simulation test conditions produce fractures similar to fuel rod ramp tests.

evidence_span: Iodine SIMFEX tests on unlined unirradiated and irradiated Zircaloy-4 showed that the PCI simulation test conditions produce fractures similar to fuel rod ramp tests.
